avalancheActivity.highlights: Wind slabs can be expected in mountains due to snowfall and snowdrift from variable winds.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snow has added and drifted in recent days. Before that, there was relatively little snow, with old stiff and stable snow in mountains.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.

weatherForecast.highlights: Kólnandi veður, rólegt og dálítil él.

avalancheActivity.comment: Several sluffs and small avalanches fell around Ísafjörður on Tuesday 4 March.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Wind slabs can be expected in mountains due to snowfall and snowdrift from variable winds.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snow has added and drifted in recent days. Before that, there was relatively little snow, with old stiff and stable snow in mountains. Wind slabs are expected to continue to build up in the mountains.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.

avalancheActivity.comment: An avalanche released in Krossafjall on March 4th.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Some new snow is in the area and wind slabs could be present at high elevations.

snowpackStructure.highlights: It has snowed a bit in the area during variable winds, and snow has accumulated in gullies and lows. Wind slab formation is expected at high elevations. Small sluffs could release in the sun in the next few days.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.

weatherForecast.highlights: Fremur hægar breytilegar áttir og bjart með köflum. Kólnar dálítið um helgina.

avalancheActivity.comment: Small sluff released in Magnúsartindur in Oddsskarð on Feb 26th.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Little snow is at low elevations and hard packed snow is in the mountains. Small slabs could be present at high elevations.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Little snow is at low elevations and hard packed snow is in the mountains. Small slabs could be present at high elevations after a little snow on Tuesday with blowing snow. Chances of some snowfall on Saturday.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.

weatherForecast.highlights: Skýjað með köflum næstu daga og úrkomulítið. Líkur á dálítilli snjókomu á laugardag. Hiti um og yfir frostmarki á láglendi.
